is_notifiable.description: Indicates whether the user is set to receive notifications

date_updated.description: The date and time when the user was last updated

is_online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the user

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the user's account

url.description: URL to access the user's detailed information

date_created.description: The date and time when the user was created

role_sid.description: The unique identifier for the role assigned to the user

sid.description: The unique identifier for the user

attributes.description: Additional attributes or metadata associated with the user

identity.description: The identity or username of the user

chat_service_sid.description: The unique identifier for the chat service the user is associated with

links.description: Contains URLs to related resources for the user data.

user_conversations.description: URL to retrieve the conversations associated with the user
